name: GullBuddies!
description:
They ate your picnic lunch...

...They disrupted your day at the beach...

...They're shitting everywhere.

It's time to make them pay. 

***GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS***

Enter to start. Arrow keys to move. Enter to start, and Space to pause.

Eat the seagulls while avoiding their poo. You get fatter and slower the more you eat. Each time they hit you, your shirt gets more poop on it. At eight poops, you're done.

***KNOWN ISSUES***

-Some depth problems with flying birds.

-Character sometimes gets frozen after eating a bird. Pause and unpause to fix.

-Birds are annoying. This is by sweet, sweet design.

***FUTURE UPDATES***

-Horrified Bird Animation and particle blood spurt effect when bird is eaten.

-Difficulty levels, and birds will poop more often the higher your score gets

-High Score mode

-Bugfixes and some code cleanup

If you like it and would like to see me produce more (and better) games, please donate. I'm a Wizard who travels the country and this is how I support myself! This is my first Unity game, and my first release on this platform. I've signed up for ProcJam, so please keep an eye out for me!
